content:
ChannelEndpointElement Class

Definition

Provides options for configuring contract, binding, and address properties of the channel endpoint, which are used by clients to connect to service endpoints on the server. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public sealed class ChannelEndpointElement : System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Inheritance
Object
ConfigurationElement
ChannelEndpointElement

Constructors

ChannelEndpointElement()

Initializes a new instance of the ChannelEndpointElement class.

public ChannelEndpointElement ();

ChannelEndpointElement(EndpointAddress, String)

Initializes a new instance of the ChannelEndpointElement class with the specified endpoint address and contract type.

public ChannelEndpointElement (System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress address, string contractType);
Parameters
address
EndpointAddress

Specifies the address of the endpoint. The default is an empty string. The address must be an absolute URI.

contractType
String

A string that indicates which contract this endpoint is exposing. The assembly must implement the contract type.

Properties

Address

Specifies the address of the endpoint.

public Uri Address { get; set; }
Value
Uri

A URI that contains the address of the endpoint. The address must be an absolute URI.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

BehaviorConfiguration

Gets or sets the behavior name of the behavior to be used to instantiate the endpoint.

public string BehaviorConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
String

The behavior name of the behavior to be used to instantiate the endpoint. The behavior name must be in scope at the point the service is defined. The default is an empty string.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Binding

Gets or sets the type of binding to use.

public string Binding { get; set; }
Value
String

The type of binding to use. The type must have a registered configuration section in order to be referenced. The type is the registered by section name, rather than by the type name of the binding.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

BindingConfiguration

Gets or sets the binding name of the binding to use when the endpoint is instantiated.

public string BindingConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
String

The binding name of the binding to use when the endpoint is instantiated. The binding name must be in scope at the point the endpoint is defined. The default is an empty string.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Contract

Gets or sets the contract that this endpoint is exposing.

public string Contract { get; set; }
Value
String

The contract this endpoint is exposing. The assembly must implement the contract type.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

EndpointConfiguration

Gets or sets the name of the standard endpoint that is set by the stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement.Kind* property, which references to the additional configuration information of this standard endpoint. The same name must be defined in the StandardEndpointsSection.

public string EndpointConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that specifies the name of the standard endpoint.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Headers

Gets a collection of address headers.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AddressHeaderCollectionElement Headers { get; }
Value
AddressHeaderCollectionElement

An AddressHeaderCollectionElement that contains a collection of address headers.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Identity

Gets an identity that enables the authentication of an endpoint by other endpoints that are exchanging messages with it.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IdentityElement Identity { get; }
Value
IdentityElement

An IdentityElement that contains configuration settings for enabling the authentication of an endpoint by other endpoints exchanging messages with it.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Kind

Gets or sets the type of standard endpoint applied. The type must be registered in the <extensions> section or in machine.config. If nothing is specified, a common channel endpoint is created.

public string Kind { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that denotes the type of standard endpoint.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Name

Gets or sets a unique identifier of an endpoint for a given contract.

public string Name { get; set; }
Value
String

An endpoint for a given contract. The default is an empty string. The service model allows the user to define multiple clients for a given contract type. Each definition must be differentiated by a unique configuration name. If this property is omitted, the corresponding endpoint is used as the default endpoint associated with the specified contract type.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Remarks

The service model allows the user to define multiple clients for a given contract type. Each definition must be differentiated by a unique configuration name. If this property is omitted, the corresponding endpoint is used as the default endpoint associated with the specified contract type.

Properties 

protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }
Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection

To be added.

Methods

Reset(ConfigurationElement) 

protected override void Reset (System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement parentElement);
Parameters
parentElement
ConfigurationElement

To be added.

Attributes
SecurityCriticalAttribute
